content:
Final review on search parameters shows the following 3 search parameters as not having an expression
FamilyMemberHistory.gender (Token)
MessageDefinition.parent (Token)
Subscription.add-tag (Token)
@Grahame Grieve do we want to add these for R4? they look simple enough
I do not think this is easy at all
@Lloyd McKenzie @Michelle M Miller the search parameter for FamilyMemberHistory.gender should be renamed "sex"?
Yeah, we missed discussing the search parameter, but I think it's safe to assume it should be changed. Speaking of which, it looks like you already applied the change, right?
